mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallerygood(gallerygoodno, rdate, galleryno, memberno) VALUES (gallerygood_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{galleryno}, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT gallerygoodno, rdate, galleryno, memberno FROM gallerygood ORDER BY gallerygoodno DESC

SELECT r.gallerygoodno, r.rdate as r_rdate, r.galleryno, c.gallery, r.memberno, m.id, m.mname FROM gallery c, gallerygood r, member m where c.galleryno = r.galleryno AND r.memberno = m.memberno ORDER BY gallerygoodno DESC
